SPEAKER: Anakin
UTTERANCE: I saw your ship. What are you doing out here?

SPEAKER: Padme
UTTERANCE: I was so worried about you. Obi-Wan told me terrible things.

SPEAKER: Anakin
UTTERANCE: What things?

SPEAKER: Padme
UTTERANCE: He said you've turned to the Dark Side. That you... killed younglings.

SPEAKER: Anakin
UTTERANCE: Obi-Wan is trying to turn you against me.

SPEAKER: Padme
UTTERANCE: He cares about us.

SPEAKER: Anakin
UTTERANCE: Us?

SPEAKER: Padme
UTTERANCE: He knows. He wants to help you. Anakin, all I want is your love.

SPEAKER: Anakin
UTTERANCE: Love won't save you, Padme. Only my new powers can do that.

SPEAKER: Padme
UTTERANCE: At what cost? You're a good person, don't do this!

SPEAKER: Anakin
UTTERANCE: I won't lose you the way I lost my mother. I am becoming more powerful than any Jedi has ever dreamed of. And I'm doing it for you. To protect you.

SPEAKER: Padme
UTTERANCE: Come away with me. Help me raise our child. Leave everything else behind while we still can!

SPEAKER: Anakin
UTTERANCE: Don't you see? We don't HAVE to run away anymore. I have brought PEACE to the Republic. I am more powerful than the Chancellor, I—I can overthrow him! And together, you and I can rule the galaxy, make things the way we want them to be!

SPEAKER: Padme
UTTERANCE: I don't believe what I'm hearing... Obi-Wan was right, you've changed!

SPEAKER: Anakin
UTTERANCE: I don't want to hear any more about Obi-Wan. The Jedi turned against me—don't YOU turn against me!

SPEAKER: Padme
UTTERANCE: I don't know you anymore... Anakin, you're breaking my heart! You're going down a path I can't follow.

SPEAKER: Anakin
UTTERANCE: Because of Obi-Wan?

SPEAKER: Padme
UTTERANCE: Because of what you've done... what you plan to do. Stop. Stop now! Come back... I love you!

SPEAKER: Anakin
UTTERANCE: LIAR!

SPEAKER: Padme
UTTERANCE: No!

SPEAKER: Anakin
UTTERANCE: You're with HIM! You brought him here to KILL me!

SPEAKER: Padme
UTTERANCE: No! ... Anakin...
